title: or under the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in the Schedule
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (delegation ministerial functions) order 2021

title: or under the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in the Schedule
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by 
or under the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in the Schedule 
are delegated to Josepha Madigan, Minister of State at the Department of 
Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [222] 3
text_norm: 2 power duty minister education conferred provision act oireachtas specified schedule delegated josepha madigan minister state department education notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 7th may 2021 222 3

title: or under the provisions of the Acts of the Oireachtas specified in the Schedule
heading: Section 7(1)(a) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so far as that
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Section 7(1)(a) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so far as that 
paragraph relates to persons with a disability or other special educational needs 
(both within the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Subsections (3) and (4) of section 7 of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those 
subsections relate to the performance of the functions under that Act delegated 
by this order 

Section 33(i) and (j)(iv) of the Education Act 1998 

Section 37A (inserted by section 8 of the Education (Admission to Schools) Act 
2018 (No. 14 of 2018)) of the Education Act 1998 

Sections 21, 22 and 28 of, and Schedule 1 to, the Education for Persons with 
Special Educational Needs Act 2004 (No. 30 of 2004) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 May, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [222]
